identity.title: Calculating the Winning Percentage of a Sports Team (Case 3)

content.prompt: Construct a program that receives from the user the number of games that a sports team won and tied in a tournament of 12 games and calculates the winning percentage of the sports team, counting ties as half wins. The program must ask the user for each of the two inputs until the user enters a valid number.
